name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-oriented Full-Stack Engineer with over 10 years of experience in **Backend development** and **Web applications**, specializing in **AI** and **Generative AI** technologies. Skilled in creating scalable and maintainable systems, with a strong focus on **code quality**, **testing**, and **problem-solving**. Proficient in **Python (FastAPI, Django, Flask)** and leveraging cloud services such as **AWS** and **Azure** to deliver high-performing APIs and automation tools. Demonstrated ability to manage independent execution and ownership of projects, proven through impactful contributions at leading organizations such as VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska.

experience.responsibilities:

• Engineered robust **backend development** solutions with version **2.0** of **Celery** and **Redis** to handle asynchronous processing for up to **50,000** financial transaction requests daily.
• Executed deployment of microservices on **Azure App Services** with infrastructure managed via **Terraform**, achieving a **99.9%** uptime for cloud operations.
• Created and optimized data pipelines for regulatory data exchange leveraging **Apache Airflow** and **Azure Functions**, ensuring proper data flow within **30 minutes** of receipt.
• Led security assessments and integrated **OAuth2** and **Azure AD B2C**, achieving secure authentication for **over 10,000** users while maintaining system integrity.
• Engaged in comprehensive root cause analysis with a focus on **code quality** and **testing** practices to resolve system integration challenges efficiently.
• Demonstrated ownership by independently executing complex projects while collaborating with cross-functional teams to enhance project outcomes.

Backend Development:
- Developed backend systems in **Python** and **FastAPI** to automate document workflows, enhancing **scalability** and ensuring smooth user onboarding processes.
- Engineered data pipelines for secure regulatory data exchange, utilizing **Apache Airflow** and **Azure Functions** to automate and streamline data flow, achieving a **30%** reduction in data processing time.

Frontend Development:
- Collaborated with cross-functional teams to design and implement responsive web applications, ensuring adherence to **code quality** standards and user experience.

Microservices Architecture:
- Created event-driven microservices using **Celery** and **Redis**, enabling asynchronous processing of financial data, improving transaction handling times by **25%**.

AI Integration:

Problem-Solving and Ownership:

- Took independent ownership of project components, ensuring successful release management and regulatory compliance.

● Developed scalable backend services for trade execution, portfolio management, and account tracking using **Python** and **Flask**, enhancing operations for **9,000+** trades daily.

● Demonstrated ownership and independent execution throughout the development cycles, continuously improving functionality and performance.
